mapper.select: SELECT EMP_ID , WORK_STS , EMP_NAME , PWD , SALT , ADMN_CODE , LGN_YN , END_DT , REST_ST_DT , REST_END_DT , MNGR_YN , DEPT_ID FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId} AND PWD = #{pwd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOGIN_LOG (LOG_ID , EMP_ID , LGN_SCC_DT , LGT_DT , DEL_YN) VALUES (SEQ_LGN_LG_PK.NEXTVAL , #{empId} , SYSDATE , NULL , 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_ID , E.WORK_STS , E.EMP_NAME , E.PWD , E.SALT , E.ADMN_CODE , E.LGN_YN , E.END_DT , E.REST_ST_DT , E.REST_END_DT , E.PWD_CN_DT , E.MNGR_YN , E.DEPT_ID , L.LOG_ID FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN LOGIN_LOG L ON E.EMP_ID = L.EMP_ID WHERE E.EMP_ID = #{empId} AND L.LGT_DT IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE LOGIN_LOG SET LGT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE LOG_ID = #{_parameter} AND LGT_DT IS NULL
UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET LGN_TRY_DT = SYSDATE WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId} AND LGN_TRY < 5
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE SYSDATE > (SELECT LGN_TRY_DT + 1 / 24 FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_ID = 'system01' AND LGN_TRY = 5)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUTE (CMMT_ID , CMMT_DATE , CMMT_TIME , FNSH_TIME , EMP_ID , DEL_YN) VALUES (SEQ_CMMT_PK.NEXTVAL , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , NULL , #{empId} , 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM COMMUTE WHERE TO_CHAR(CMMT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND EMP_ID = #{empId}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUTE SET FNSH_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId} AND FNSH_TIME IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_ID = #{_parameter} AND SYSDATE > PWD_CN_DT + 90

SELECT L.LOG_ID , L.EMP_ID , TO_CHAR(L.LGN_SCC_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LGN_SCC_DT , TO_CHAR(L.LGT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LGT_DT , L.DEL_YN , E.EMP_NAME FROM LOGIN_LOG L JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_ID = L.EMP_ID
WHERE L.EMP_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
WHERE TO_CHAR(L.LGN_SCC_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
WHERE TO_CHAR(L.LGT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
WHERE EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY L.LGN_SCC_DT

SELECT V.ACCS_ID , V.EMP_ID , V.ACCS_URL , V.ACCS_DT , V.DEL_YN , E.EMP_NAME FROM VISITED_HISTORY V JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_ID = V.EMP_ID
WHERE V.EMP_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
WHERE E.EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
WHERE V.ACCS_URL LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
WHERE V.ACCS_DT LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY ACCS_DT
SELECT T.TM_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN TEAM T ON E.DEPT_ID = T.DEPT_ID WHERE E.EMP_ID = #{empId}
